TextLibrary.Text: The Archive has an Automated Defense and Gun Turrets guarding it. I hate to mention the obvious, but if they are all still intact, then the Soulless probably haven't been here yet.
The Archive has an Automated Defense and Gun Turrets guarding it. I hate to mention the obvious, but if they are all still intact, then the Soulless probably haven't been here yet.
Maybe they've been repaired. Maybe the Soulless sneaked past them. Now we're here, we must at least look!
Maybe they've been repaired. Maybe the Soulless sneaked past them. Now we're here, we must at least look!
